name: Euclid - New Standard for Ethereum Restaking
description: Euclid Finance has defined THE NEW STANDARD FOR ETHEREUM RESTAKING. Euclid aims to build a trustless and permissionless operator network powered by EigenLayer. This is its official run Operator. Euclid is a protocol under NGA DAO, which also includes Equilibria Finance and Artemis Finance, jointly managing over $100 million in assets.
